artist: Artist: Vincent Tinguely, Montreal, Quebec, Canada , et al.; Publisher: Vincent Tinguely, Montreal, Quebec, Canada , Montreal
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photo-collage of various abstracted images figures with text printed in blue offset lithography on orange wove paper covers; 24 pp.
medium: Blue and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Perfect Waste of Time, the monthly broadsheet, vol. 2, no. 1
